attributes.action: postpone George Michael's Wembley show so that the rightful opening artist Muse can do so
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Exactly what it says on the tin, Muse have earned the right to open the new stadium in recent years with outstanding contribution to British music, whereas George Michael has only just come back out of retirement, so is bound to be rusty and not do the venue justice. Muse have recently won the best live act at the Brit awards, and hense they should open the stadium

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
